Title: Permits security guard companies in certain instances to perform security related work in N.Y. city by armed guards without obtaining a N.Y. city firearms special permit
Summary: Permits security guard companies, employing ten or more guards who are each holders of a duly issued, current special armed guard registration card, to perform security related work in the city of New York by armed guards without obtaining a New York city firearms special permit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to permitting security guard companies in certain instances to perform security related work in the city of New York by armed guards without obtaining a New York city firearms special permit
